title: [Y gwir er gwaethed yw]
notes: Date of publication and publisher suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: pages lacking at beginning and end.
For a discussion on how this was identified, see Journal of Welsh Bibliographical Society, Vol. 4, No. 6, July 1935.
